Class GwtApplicationModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.esoco.gwt.client.app.GwtApplicationModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.esoco.ewt.app.EWTModule

    public abstract class GwtApplicationModule
extends java.lang.Object
implements de.esoco.ewt.app.EWTModule
    Base class for application modules.

      • getMainViewStyle

        protected de.esoco.ewt.style.ViewStyle getMainViewStyle()

        The view style
